edu.rit.se.coolTeamB.core

Class LocalVend

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.rit.se.coolTeamB.core.LocalVend

  • public class LocalVend
extends java.util.Observable
    The LocalVend Java class extends Observable and stores the data for a local vending machine connected to the Smart Vending Machine (SVM) system.
    Version:
    1.00 21 Mar 2013
    Author:
    Michael Surdouski (mxs1649@rit.edu)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalVend(int _ID, int row, int col, int depth)
      LocalVend stores all stock information which is necessary for the SVM system to operate.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalVend

        public LocalVend(int _ID,
         int row,
         int col,
         int depth)
          throws NegativeInputException,
                 OutOfBoundsStockException,
                 ExistingStockException,
                 StockException,
                 NullDateException
        LocalVend stores all stock information which is necessary for the SVM system to operate.
        Precondition:
        _ID is not negative
        Parameters:
        _ID - ID of the vending machine
        row - number of rows in the vending machine
        col - number of columns in the vending machine
        depth - depth of the vending machine
        Postcondition:
        all members have been initialized with values below (not all have values upon initialization, in which case they aren't listed) lock - false runningTotal - 00.00
        Throws:
        StockException
        NullDateException
        ExistingStockException
        OutOfBoundsStockException
        NegativeInputException

      • restock

        public void restock(int row,
           int col,
           java.util.Calendar expDate)
             throws StockException,
                    NegativeInputException,
                    OutOfBoundsStockException,
                    NullDateException,
                    NonExistingStockException
        Fills up the item slot at a certain row and column with items of the same type as already are in the slot but with new expiration dates.
        Parameters:
        row - row of the slot that is to be restocked
        col - column of the slot that is to be restocked
        expDate - expiration date for the new items being restocked
        Throws:
        StockException
        NegativeInputException
        OutOfBoundsStockException
        NullDateException
        NonExistingStockException

      • addItem

        public void addItem(java.lang.String name,
           double price,
           java.util.Calendar expDate,
           int row,
           int col,
           int howMany)
             throws OutOfBoundsStockException,
                    StockException,
                    NegativeInputException,
                    NullDateException
        Creates and adds an specified number of items to the end of the slot specified by row and column.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the item
        price - price of the item
        expDate - expiration date of the item
        row - row of the slot where item is to be added
        col - column of the slot where item is to be added
        howMany - number of items to be added
        Throws:
        OutOfBoundsStockException
        StockException
        NegativeInputException
        NullDateException

        col - column of the items
        howMany - number of items

      • addMoney

        public void addMoney(double amount)
              throws NegativeInputException
        Add money to running total on machine.
        Precondition:
        amount of money added doesn't bypass double memory limitations the amount of money isn't negative
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of money to be added to running total on machine
        Postcondition:
        amount has been added to running total
        Throws:
        NegativeInputException

      • checkout

        public double checkout()
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                       OutOfBoundsStockException,
                       NonExistingStockException,
                       StockException
        Perform a checkout on the vending machine for current items in cart.
        Precondition:
        there is enough money in running total to pay for items
        Returns:
        change the amount of change returned to customer after purchasing items
        Throws:
        OutOfBoundsStockException
        StockException
        NonExistingStockException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
